title: WhatsApp’s upcoming polls feature will be way more useful than you think
content:
These days, polls seem to be everywhere. Hell, you just need to check out our Twitter account to see how much we love them. But there’s one place polls don’t exist: WhatsApp. Well, this won’t be for much longer. According to a report by WABetaInfo, the company is working on a polls feature for groups. As per the screenshot in the report (and below), the function is still in its early stages, and we don’t have many details about what it’ll look like.   The screenshot doesn’t tell us much about the poll feature apart from a confirmation that’s it’s…
